chassis.whyChosen: Balances crash safety, manufacturability, and cost for high-volume production.
chassis.futureInnovation: Hybrid steel-aluminum multi-material frames with topology-optimized joints.

brake_disc.whyChosen: Excellent thermal capacity and damping under repeated braking cycles.
brake_disc.tradeoff: Higher unsprung mass and corrosion susceptibility.
brake_disc.futureInnovation: Coated lightweight rotors and metal-matrix composite discs.

engine_block.whyChosen: Reduces mass while maintaining adequate thermal conductivity and machinability.
engine_block.tradeoff: Lower high-temperature strength than cast iron in extreme duty cycles.
engine_block.futureInnovation: Additively enhanced cooling channels and reinforced Al-Si alloys.

hood.whyChosen: Lightweight panel improves fuel economy and handling response.
hood.tradeoff: Higher repair cost than mild steel after localized dents.

windows.whyChosen: Delivers visibility, scratch resistance, and safety fragmentation behavior.
windows.tradeoff: Adds weight compared with advanced polymer glazing systems.
windows.futureInnovation: Hard-coated lightweight glazing with integrated smart tinting.

tires.whyChosen: Provides traction, fatigue resistance, and broad temperature operability.
tires.tradeoff: Rolling resistance and wear particle generation.
tires.futureInnovation: Low-emission tread compounds and advanced silica-filler systems.

chassis.primaryMaterial: Aluminum spaceframe with localized carbon fiber reinforcement
chassis.whyChosen: High stiffness-to-weight ratio improves dynamics and acceleration.
chassis.tradeoff: Higher manufacturing complexity and repair specialization.
chassis.futureInnovation: Out-of-autoclave carbon composites with improved recyclability.

brake_disc.whyChosen: Exceptional fade resistance and thermal stability at extreme braking loads.
brake_disc.tradeoff: Very high component and replacement cost.
brake_disc.futureInnovation: Lower-cost ceramic matrix formulations for broader adoption.

engine_block.whyChosen: Supports high specific output with reduced front-axle mass.
engine_block.tradeoff: Tighter cooling and lubrication design margins.
engine_block.futureInnovation: Functionally graded alloys for hot-spot durability.

hood.whyChosen: Cuts mass high on the vehicle and improves center-of-gravity placement.
hood.tradeoff: Impact repair often requires full panel replacement.
hood.futureInnovation: Fast-cycle resin systems for scalable composite body panels.

windows.whyChosen: Maintains rigidity and premium acoustics at reduced thickness.
windows.tradeoff: Still heavier than optimized polymer glazing alternatives.
windows.futureInnovation: Hybrid glass-polymer laminates with hardcoat durability.

tires.primaryMaterial: High-grip synthetic rubber with performance silica blends
tires.whyChosen: Delivers high lateral grip and braking performance.
tires.tradeoff: Faster wear and narrower optimal temperature window.
tires.futureInnovation: Adaptive tread compounds with thermal-response tuning.

chassis.whyChosen: Manages battery protection, torsional stiffness, and manufacturability.
chassis.tradeoff: Joining dissimilar materials raises process complexity.
chassis.futureInnovation: Structural battery packs with multifunctional load-bearing cells.

brake_disc.whyChosen: Stable braking surface despite lower friction-brake usage in regen-heavy driving.
brake_disc.tradeoff: Can still corrode from infrequent thermal cycling.
brake_disc.futureInnovation: Low-corrosion coated rotors optimized for regenerative braking profiles.

engine_block.primaryMaterial: N/A (electric drive unit housing: cast aluminum)
engine_block.whyChosen: Lightweight housing supports thermal pathways for motors and inverters.
engine_block.tradeoff: Requires precise thermal management around power electronics.
engine_block.futureInnovation: Integrated motor-inverter housings with advanced TIM materials.

hood.whyChosen: Offsets battery mass while maintaining front crash performance.
hood.tradeoff: Repair and part standardization differ across OEM platforms.
hood.futureInnovation: Recycled-content thermoplastic body panels with high impact toughness.

windows.whyChosen: Reduces wind and road noise in quieter EV cabins.
windows.tradeoff: Weight increase versus basic tempered glazing.
windows.futureInnovation: Electrochromic glazing integrated with thermal load control.

tires.whyChosen: Improves range while handling high EV torque loads.
tires.tradeoff: May reduce peak grip compared with aggressive performance compounds.
tires.futureInnovation: Bio-based elastomers and wear-optimized tread architectures.
